Lyric:
[by:电音综合症]
[00:16.060]All alone as you look through the door
[00:19.940]Nothing left to see
[00:23.820]If it hurts and you can't take no more
[00:27.840]Lay it all on me
[00:30.600]No you don't have to keep it on a locking key
[00:34.960]Cause I will never let you down
[00:38.480]And if you can't escape all your uncertainties
[00:43.100]Baby I can show you how
[00:47.520]Let my love in, let my love in
[00:51.240]Lay your heart on me
[00:55.380]If you're hurting, if you're hurting
